"A.D.2028/3/22/16:00": "Puha, haa, haa...! Did I...make it...back...?"
"Thank god... I managed to log out in time..."
"What on earth was that? Was that a bug in the Ether Net? That's too much to handle, for real."
"Calm down, calm down, me. All of that happened inside PSO2. Now that I'm back here, there's nothing to worry about."
"That's right, this is Earth. Blue Mother Earth! A peaceful place without conflict!"
"And this is mi casa--my room. My computer that's essential to the modern society, and a place to rest when I'm tired, my bed-..."
"That's right, this is Earth, Blue Mother Earth! This is my room. My room. So that bed... ...is my..."
"Calm down, Hitsugi! Calm down! Deep breath, DEEEEP breaths! *inhale, exhale* *inhale, exhale*"
"I'm Hitsugi. Hitsugi Yasaka, age 16, and this is the year 2028! The era... I forgot! I'm in second year of high school since Spring."
"This is a Dormitory. At school, in Tokyo, on the planet Earth. This is the real world! Definitely NOT inside PSO2!"
"That was just a dream! What I saw on the bed was an illusion! Optical illusion! I'm just tired! ...Alright!"
"No! It's still here! A-and it's waking up!"
"...Where am I?"
"And it spoke! No, it could've been an auditory hallucination..."
"...Hey, where am I?"
"It's looking at me! Talking to me! It wasn't an illusion or a dream!"
"...Wh-what's wrong?"
"Don't move! Stop moving! I can see everything! I mean, this is too racy for this time of the day! Wait, why are you naked?! Where are your clothes?!"
"...naked?"
"I said don't move! Ah, for Pete's sake! Uuurgh!"
"Are you okay? You're not hurt right?"
"...Wait a minute. Time to stop escaping, and accept reality."
"Alright, now you've calmed down, Hitsugi. ...Okay, let's hear you out! Who are you? What's your name?"
"Hitsugi."
"That's my name! I meant YOUR name! So what is it?"
"It wasn't Hitsugi...? ...Then I don't know."
"...Oh, come on! What are you talking about?!"
"You suddenly appear in my room, the spitting image of my avatar... It looks as if you came straight from PSO2!"
"...It can't be... that you actually did appear from my game..."
"No, that couldn't have happened! [Mother] didn't say anything about this!"
"...Uh oh, did I make too much noise? I think I hear the dorm head coming!"
"Okay, okay, I'm coming!"
"...! Don't! Watch out!"
"Ow... That hurts... What's with--?!"
"...Huh? Wai- what's this monster?! And there's more coming?!"
"Watch out!"
"Ahh!"
"You... protected me! ... Kuh!"
"D-don't come here!"
"...Help! Someone, please help us!"
"Y-yo-- --<%me>!? W-why are you here...!"
